post.body: and filled with sugar
Don't know why I bother waiting, because I go every year, lol
if the rumors are true, tickets might go a bit quicker than usual this year. I usually wait until all bands are announced
definitely. unless it's a maturity test.
True, but Trey is a huge fan of Roo. That could mean something.
have you seen this? http://snurl.com/8noaq
I'm hoping after summer 2009, I'll have photos of him on a Tennessee farm
Manchester, Tenn, actually. The best roadtrip of the year http://bonnaroo.com/
as in Springsteen. My fingers are crossed
that sounds heavenly. i def need to invest in one. it's probably all i'd eat though. i inhale them.
i consider that option more often than i should
@tla_kate interesting, according to the website, they already issued me a new one. but i don't have eet!
do they give you a new pic? I kind of really want a new pic.
exactly
i like the idea of driving
dude, what's with that?
lol. it looks like they're playing rugby
Rolling Stone thinks Phish will headline Bonnaroo this year. Holy crap. http://snurl.com/8noaq
I haven't done a single blog post this week. Using my free time trying to (try to) write a story for @citypaper 's fiction contest.
i've been doing a ton of writing this week.
Listening to: http://snurl.com/8hqh9
apparently rumors are flying that both Phish and Bruce will be at Bonnaroo this year. Anyone hear anything about this?
heading out to lunch with B and his sister. She's passing through town on the way up from NC to Mass
Getting really excited for my alma mater's big alum event in January
and i think ive eaten 25
someone brought in homemade pizelles today
packing up here and heading home. Then out for a run before the rains come tomorrow
leaving the office hooray! running out for some last minute gifts then big family dinner!
counting down the minutes until its acceptable for me to get out of here. of course there's nothing going on on xmas eve. why are we here?
getting very excited for the big dinner tonight. Christmas Eve is way better than Christmas with my family. Good times
Merry Christmas Eve, all! Listening to Christmas music at my desk and putting on my best Bob Cratchet.
eek I gotta get my shopping on
Gaaah I still have Christmas shopping to do before tomorrow!
Dear Today, be a little bit slower, why don't you?
Freestyle dog, hilarious http://snurl.com/91fro
my driver's license has been expired since october. really need to get on top of that shiz.
Brooklyn be trippin, yo http://snurl.com/91drp
Hey everyone! Back from NYC. Fun fun fun weekend!
do you guys think a roadtrip across the U.S. could be a disaster for a honeymoon? Still looking for cheap destinations!
Seems like it's snowing everywhere on the east coast except philly. C'mon, Philly, enough with this rain
